Entries.spouseRoom_Robin: Hey Honey. Good morning.#$e#Let me know if there's anything that needs to be fixed.
Entries.Rainy_Day_0: It's raining. Not the most pleasant weather for a carpenter.$2#$e#Well, at least is good for the crops.
Entries.Rainy_Day_1: I checked the buildings just in case. Doesn't seem to be any leaks.
Entries.Rainy_Day_2: Good morning @! I woke up early from the sound of the rain and made you some breakfast. [194 195 210 211 216]  #$e#Stay warm and don't work too hard. I want you to stay healthy.
Entries.Rainy_Day_3: I hope the road to my old house doesn't get too muddy.$2
Entries.Rainy_Night_0: The rain makes it feel like we're all alone.$6#$e#I'm cold... aren't you ready to tuck into bed?$6
Entries.Rainy_Night_1: Make sure you change into something warm. I don't want you to get sick.#$e#Can you hear the rain pattering on the roof, @?
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: Ah...The soothing sound of rain overhead... I'm going to sleep well tonight.
Entries.Rainy_Night_3: Working with wood can be so relaxing.$u#$e#I should try teaching you some time, maybe you'd like it.
Entries.Rainy_Night_4: Hey @, glad you're home... I missed you.$7#$b#.
Entries.Indoor_Day_0: Good morning @#$e#Ready for a hard day's work? I am.
Entries.Indoor_Day_1: Make sure to eat plenty, you'll need energy for the day. I know how tiring manual work can be.
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: Did you sleep well honey?.#$b#Me? Of course.
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: Hey, someone must've gotten a good night of sleep... it's no surprise after last night.$7
Entries.Indoor_Day_4: Good morning, honey. Another day of chores on the farm, huh?
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: Wow, you look tired today honey.#$b#I hope you still have some energy for later.$7
Entries.Indoor_Night_2: You look like you've been working hard @. Let me help you de-stress.$7
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: Are you done with your work for the day? I'm ready to have some fun.$7
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: *phew*! I just finished my work for today. Now we can spend some time together.#$e#So, tell me about your day.
Entries.Introduction: Have you met everyone in town yet? That sounds exhausting.
Entries.Resort: Wow, look at these structures!$h#$b#I can tell they were made by a master builder. I'm really impressed!
Entries.Resort_Shore: Hey, look! I can see another island from here.
Entries.Resort_Chair: Hey @. You know, I was just thinking about how far the town has come since you first moved here.#$b#As your wife, I must say that I'm proud of you.
Entries.reject_865: Veggie salt? Sounds good, but I don't need it.
Entries.reject_866: Hmm... when I think of flowers, I think of Evelyn. Maybe show this to her?
Entries.pamHouseUpgrade: Our little plan worked out well, don't you think? Pam and Penny seem really happy.
Entries.pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous: Our little plan worked out well, don't you think? Pam and Penny seem really happy.
Entries.MovieInvitation: Ooh... Two tickets for tonight's show, huh? Sounds good! I'll meet you there.$h
Entries.cc_Bridge: Hey! I heard some weird noises last night, and woke up this morning to find the quarry bridge completely repaired!#$b#It's a miracle of woodworking!
Entries.cc_Complete: I knew it from the moment you stepped off that bus, @... you were destined to be our town's hero!$h
Entries.cc_Begin: Hey! I heard that Lewis showed you around the Community Center... It'd be great if you could fix that place up. It used to be a really nice building!
Entries.Mon: Have I told you that I built my old house from the ground up?#$e#It's definitely been the highlight of my career so far.
Entries.Tue: I wonder what I should do with the lab in my house. Maybe I can renovate it.
Entries.Wed: Hey there, @.#$e#I was just daydreaming about some new projects.
Entries.Thu: It can get pretty lonely up here in the mountains. Visit me as much as you want honey.
Entries.Fri: You've met my son Sebastian, right? He lives downstairs.#$e#He's a little shy, but I'm sure he'll warm up to you if you're nice to him.
Entries.Fri_inlaw_Sebastian: I miss my Sebby... he was always a little misunderstood, but I believe in him.
Entries.Fri4: #$1 RobinSeb#I found an ashtray in Sebastian's room, and it smelled really weird. Should I be worried about this?#$e#Sometimes I worry about Sebastian... he doesn't have many friends and doesn't really seem to care about his future very much...#$e#I would talk to him about it but he never opens up to me.
Entries.Fri4_inlaw_Sebastian: Sebastian told me he's trying to quit smoking! I'm really proud of him.
Entries.Sat: Both our houses are in beautiful areas, we're so lucky.
Entries.Sun: I'm not even sure what Maru's working on. I think it has something to do with black holes.
Entries.Sun2: Hi honey! It's good to see you.
Entries.Sun6: Hi honey! It's good to see you.
Entries.event_wood1: Great, then this blueprint should be a piece of cake for you!$h
Entries.event_wood2: Well, then I have the perfect blueprint to get you started!
Entries.summer_Mon: Wood is a wonderful material... it's versatile, cheap, strong, and each piece has it's own unique character!
Entries.summer_Tue: If you need any buildings on your farm upgraded, just ask me!#$e#You'll need to provide enough lumber and stone for the project. And it costs money, too.#$e#Yeah, I know you're my husband, but you're my best client too! I don't want to lose my income.$1
Entries.summer_Fri: We're pretty isolated from the rest of the world here in Stardew Valley.#$e#It has its pros and cons.
Entries.fall_Mon: #$1 RobinMaru#Maru likes gems. She uses them in her inventions.#$e#So how are you and Maru getting along?
Entries.fall_Thu: It can get pretty lonely up here in the mountains. Visit me as much as you want honey.
Entries.fall_Fri: Have you met the wild man that lives behind my house?$s#$e#I guess I don't really mind, as long as he doesn't bother us.
Entries.winter_Mon: Hey, it's a perfect time of year to gather wood. Tell me if you need help.
Entries.winter_Fri: My parents were bewildered when I told them I wanted to be a carpenter.#$e#They were pretty old-fashioned.
Entries.winter_Fri_inlaw_Sebastian: I think the farm life is really healthy for Sebby.
Entries.winter_Sat: Everything looks still after some fresh snow. It's so beautiful

Entries.HaveBabyQuestion: Sooo... having a child together, does it sounds good to you too @?.$7
Entries.HaveBabyQuestion_Adoption: ... What would you say to adopting a child with me?

Entries.give_flowersA: Truth be told...I wasn't expecting this.#$b#But I like you and you like me, so why not?.$7#$b#Yes @, let's see where this goes.$7
Entries.give_flowersB: Truth be told...I wasn't expecting this.#$b#But I like you and you like me, so why not?.$7#$b#Yes @, let's see where this goes.$7
Entries.give_pendant: .....$5#$b#They say third time's the charm, right?.#$b#I really hope that's true... because my answer is yes @, I want to marry you!$7#$b#Let me handle the preparations, I'll talk to mayor Lewis about it.
Entries.stardrop_gift: Here @, this is for you.#$b#It's my way of saying thanks for being the perfect husband.$7
Entries.rejectNPCB: I'm not interested in you in that way @$2

Entries.Utility.cs.5371: @... %spouse... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you husband and wife!$h

Entries.Robin0: Getting married again... it feels surreal. But I feel that this time it'll be different.
Entries.Robin1: Don't get your hopes up @, even if we're getting married, I'll still charge you for the buildings.$1#$b#Sorry, you're my most loyal customer, and I don't want to lose my income.

Entries.3729128/f Robin 2500/w sunny/u 3/z fall/: continue/64 16/farmer 64 15 2 Robin 64 22 0/skippable/pause 1300/speak Robin "Hi @. Good morning!.$4"/pause 100/faceDirection Robin 3/pause 25/faceDirection Robin 2/speak Robin "Beautiful day, isn't it?"/pause 100/faceDirection Robin 1/pause 25/faceDirection Robin 0/emote farmer 56/pause 200/speak Robin "Hey, I have a proposal for you. Can we talk inside?.$7"/emote farmer 32/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 50/faceDirection farmer 0/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/playSound doorOpen/changeLocation farmHouse/warp farmer 11 17/positionOffset farmer 0 10/warp Robin 12 17/positionOffset Robin 0 -12/move farmer 0 0 1/move Robin 0 0 3/viewport 12 16 true/pause 1300/speak Robin "So, the day after tomorrow it'll be the fifth of summer.#$b#It's a 'special' day in my marriage, but before I explain why to you, let me tell you a little bit about me.#$b#You know I had a previous marriage before my current one with Demetrius, right?.#$b#I'd rather not talk about it, as that marriage ended pretty badly.$2#$b#After it ended, I felt that I would be done with men for good... But soon after it ended, I met Demetrius.#$b#Still, I didn't feel ready to enter into a new relationship so soon, and Demetrius wasn't interested at that time either.#$b#So we just began... seeing each other. Without any further attachments.#$b#This went on for a while, and I fell in love with him during that time... Which made me want more of our relationship.#$b#However, Demetrius was pretty... 'popular' with girls around that time, and he valued his freedom to do whatever he wanted...$2#$b#So I had to make some concessions for him to accept being in a relationship with me only.#$b#Twice a year, on the fifth of summer and the fifth of winter, we are free to do as we please.#$b#Demetrius always leaves on those days, but I have never used this 'privilege' before... Until now.#$b#You're an interesting guy @, and I really appreciate our friendship.#$b#...You know where this is going, right?.$7"/pause 500/question fork0 "So... are you interested?.#Of course I am!#No, sorry."/fork 3729128Robin/speak Robin "Oh, I see... I understand @, and I hope that this doesn't affect our friendship.$2"/emote farmer 32/speak Robin "Great. Then I'll be going, see you around @."/pause 250/move Robin 0 0 2/pause 50/move farmer 0 0 2 true/move Robin 0 3 2/pause 50/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/playSound doorOpen/end

Entries.3729128Robin: speak Robin "Great... Demetrius usually takes the last bus into the city, so come to my house around nightfall. I'll leave the door open for you.$7"/emote farmer 32/speak Robin "Okay... then I'll see you in two days @.$7"/pause 250/move Robin 0 0 2/pause 50/move farmer 0 0 2 true/move Robin 0 3 2/pause 50/move Robin 0 0 1/pause 50/move Robin 0 0 0/speak Robin "One last thing @...$5#$b#Please, don't tell Demetrius about this. It's my right to do so, but I'm not sure if he would be comfortable with me choosing you for this...$2"/move Robin 0 0 1/pause 50/move Robin 0 0 2/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/playSound doorOpen/addMailReceived RobinNoContent/end

Entries.Mon6: Hey @, is there anything you need?.
Entries.Tue6: Why don't you join us in the aerobics class sometime @? I can teach you how to dance.$h
Entries.Wed8: Sebastian's father? I rather not talk about him.$2
Entries.Thu4: I hear strange electrical noises coming from Maru's room from time to time.#$e#I always wondered whether her interests would take after me or her father. Guess it was a little of both.
Entries.Thu6: Working on an apprenticeship and raising Sebastian at the same time was hard.#$e#My head still spins when I wonder how I managed to find time for it all!
Entries.Sat6: I wonder what I should do with the lab space...$2
Entries.winter_15: Maru and I might head down as a family to that Night Market one of these nights.#$e#I don't know if I can get Sebastian to go, though...
Entries.summer_27: I don't think I'll ever get tired of seeing the moonlight jellies.#$e#I hope you can make it, too.
Entries.winter_15_2: Maru and I might head down as a family to that Night Market on one of these nights.#$e#I don't know if I can get Sebastian to go, though...
Entries.Sun: Strange sounds come from Maru's basement from time to time .#$e#I'm not even sure what she's working on.
Entries.Sun2: Hi @, if you need any repairs for your buildings, just let me know.

Entries.Sat: I miss having my dad around. I had a lot of fun helping him out in the laboratory.$2
Entries.Sat2: My dad got another job at the city. I hope he enjoys it as much as the one he had here in the valley.$2
Entries.summer_Fri4: It's so hot today, maybe I'll go out for ice cream later.
Entries.summer_Sun: I bet you're growing some interesting crops right now.#$b#A lot of exotic plants grow in the valley this time of year.
Entries.fall_Sat6: You know the microbes in the lake actually stabilize the lake's pH levels?. But in order to do that, the microbes have to die in massive quantities.#$e#Well, you know, nature's both cruel and beautiful.
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: Dad used to track the weather patterns in the valley.#$e#$c .5#I really hope the climate doesn't change to the point where it negatively affects your farming.$s#It's a little too early to tell, but the results reveal some abnormal trends.
Entries.funReturn_Maru: #$c .5#Well, it was good to go home today, but now it's even better to come 'home-home.' My heart's really here, now.$l#Mom is doing just fine. Her routine is still the same, even with me gone. How was your day?
Entries.summer_27: Just a couple more evenings until the moonlight jellies arrive. I'm really excited!#$e#Myabe Dad will come to the valley to see them again.
Entries.winter_Thu: Hey! What's up?#$e#It's a good time to explore the caves.

Entries.Maru: *giggle* It's fun to be unapologetically girly every once in a while.$h
